Note that I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, using the same words and capitalization.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| photo |
| current |
| absorption |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to a material property:

* "PSCs" (Polymer Solid Content) - This is a measure of the amount of polymer in the material, and is not a material property itself.
* "polymer aggregation-induced absorption broadening" - This is a phenomenon that occurs in some materials, where the aggregation of polymer chains leads to an increase in the absorption of light in a specific range of wavelengths. While it is related to material properties, it is not a material property itself.
